zh.name: 回复 GitHub 评论
zh.desc: 自动化或辅助回复 GitHub 上的 Issue 和 Pull Request 评论。
zh.full_desc: 该技能帮助你专业地回应 GitHub 上的反馈。它能分析评论语境，提供礼貌、准确的回复建议，并处理合并请求中的修改建议。非常适合维护开源项目或团队协作，节省沟通成本。

en.name: Address GitHub Comments
en.desc: Automate or assist in replying to GitHub Issue and Pull Request comments.
en.full_desc: Helps you respond professionally to GitHub feedback. It analyzes comment context to provide polite, accurate reply suggestions and handles change requests in PRs. Perfect for open-source maintainers or team collabs to save communication time.
